availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Thomas Ricketts (Montgomery County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas G. Ricketts and Polly Mitchell Ricketts. Married to Isabel Adams Ricketts. Father of Clementine Ricketts, John Ricketts, Emma Ricketts, and Pink Ricketts. Physician in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1860. Physician in Montgomery County in 1863. Physician in Montgomery County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, p. 244.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, Camargo, p. 239B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 82, p. 876.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 34189.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 21, Montgomery County, Kentucky, 1865, p. 81.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Montgomery County, KY, October 1863, p. 102.
Emma Jane Walker and Virginia Wilson, eds. Some Marriages in Montgomery County, Kentucky, Before 1864. (Frankfort: Kentucky Records Research Committee, DAR, 1961). p. 88.
